item.title: How I Converted My Wordpress Blog to Pelican, A Checklist
item.description: Recently there has been a lot of noise online about the Wordpress website platform. This blog is formerly a Wordpress blog, so I am able to share from personal experience how I moved this blog. I began writing this blog on the Wordpress free plan, with a few years as â€¦
